Package io.jans.service.metric

Class LdapEntryReporter.Builder

java.lang.Object
io.jans.service.metric.LdapEntryReporter.Builder
Enclosing class:
LdapEntryReporter
public static final class LdapEntryReporter.Builder extends Object
A builder for LdapEntryReporter instances. Defaults to using the default locale and time zone, writing to System.out, converting rates to events/second, converting durations to milliseconds, and not filtering metrics.
